title: Wayne Coyne On Drugs And The Flaming Lips' 'American Head'
description: All Songs Considered's Bob Boilen talks with The Flaming Lips frontman about drugs, the tragic loss of friends, the impact on families and how it all informs the band's latest album, American Head.
